title: C++/Winrt:Support extract items from a ZIP archive in a native Windows Runtime component
body:
The idea comes from the following two threads:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56635159/unzip-file-to-a-directory-in-uwp-c-winrt
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56314355/decompress-zip-archive-in-a-native-windows-runtime-component-application
As requested. C++/Winrt may need the feature to support zip by default.
